content: You will next receive a multiple-choice question, each with five options: A, B, C, D, and E respectively. Please provide your answer as a single letter option (your response should contain only one letter as the answer and no other text).

Question: There was no shade for Jenny.  She was forced to lie there exposed to what?
Options: A. full sunlight B. bright sunshine C. sunny place D. eat cake E. direct sunlight

Jenny was forced to lie there exposed to direct sunlight. As there was no shade, she was not able to avoid the sun's rays and was exposed to direct sunlight. All the other options are incorrect as they do not answer the question of what she was forced to lie there exposed to. So the answer is E. direct sunlight.
